alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Douglas; Sarpy; Saunders; Washington (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 4:16PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN SARPY...SOUTH CENTRAL WASHINGTON...SOUTHEASTERN DODGE...DOUGLAS AND NORTHEASTERN SAUNDERS COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM CDT... At 416 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm over Leshara, or 8 miles northwest of Elkhorn, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Western Omaha, Gretna, Bennington, Boys Town, Elkhorn, Millard, La Vista, Valley, Yutan, Waterloo, Leshara, Chalco, Standing Bear Lake, Zorinsky Lake, Prairie Queen Recreation Area, Flanagan Lake, Wehrspann Lake, Washington, and Two Rivers State Recreation Area. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 439 and 446. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
